Package com.islandpower.configurator.service.project

Class ProjectBatteryService

java.lang.Object
com.islandpower.configurator.service.project.ProjectBatteryService
@Service public class ProjectBatteryService extends Object
Service class to handle operations related to project batteries, including selection, configuration, and calculations.

    • selectBattery

      public ProjectBattery selectBattery(String projectId, String batteryId, int autonomyDays, int temperature)
      Selects a battery for a project, updates the configuration, and calculates the battery setup.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project
      batteryId - The ID of the selected battery
      autonomyDays - The desired autonomy days
      temperature - The operating temperature
      Returns:
      ProjectBattery The updated ProjectBattery configuration
